channel.title: Sobre a InnerSource Commons on InnerSource Commons
channel.description: Recent content in Sobre a InnerSource Commons on InnerSource Commons

item.title: Fale Conosco
item.description: A maneira mais rápida e melhor de nos contatar é entrar no Slack e fazer sua pergunta no canal #general.

item.title: InnerSource Commons Code of Conduct
item.description: Our Pledge We as members, contributors, and leaders pledge to make participation in our community a harassment-free experience for everyone, regardless of age, body size, visible or invisible disability, ethnicity, sex characteristics, gender identity and expression, level of experience, education, socio-economic status, nationality, personal appearance, race, religion, or sexual identity and orientation.

item.title: InnerSource Commons Social Media and Communications Manager
item.description: InnerSource and the InnerSource Commons are on the rise. InnerSource is moving up the Gartner hype cycle and was listed first in the 2023 top technology trends.

item.title: Members
item.description: The InnerSource Commons (ISC) community is open to all. Some community participants go above and beyond, and may be invited to become an ISC Member.

item.title: Our Sponsors
item.description: Our Partners Analog Devices “At Analog Devices, we believe strongly in the power of InnerSource to accelerate innovation and improve developer experience.

item.title: Política de Privacidade
item.description: A InnerSource Commons é uma organização independente e sem fins lucrativos que cria e compartilha conhecimento sobre InnerSource para seus membros.
